title: Double liquidity mining program for 1INCH-OPIUM pair with 1inch Exchange
body:
We propose that the participants of the new 1inch double liquidity mining program will be rewarded with 150’000 $OPIUM tokens from the Ecosystem Fund via 1inch farming mechanism during the next 6 months period.

Read the full proposal and discussion on the governance forum:
https://forum.opium.network/t/proposal-double-liquidity-mining-program-for-1inch-opium-pair-with-1inch-exchange/190
author: 0x55E170F82F50298188eecCe988e17046Dbef56A0
